sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button class="button" @click="throttledRefresh">获取新的单词</button>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { throttle } from "lodash";
  
  export default {
    methods: {
      refresh() {
        this.$emit("refresh");
      },
    },
    computed: {
      throttledRefresh() {
        return throttle(this.refresh, 3000); // 3000 毫秒为间隔时间，可根据需要进行调整
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .button {
    /* 这里可以添加样式 */
  }
  </style>
